name: .LITEMATIC
summary: Learn about .LITEMATIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open and edit LITEMATIC files with Litematica (multiplatform). The app allows players to create, export, and import LITEMATIC files from within Minecraft Java Edition.

To open a LITEMATIC file, you must install the Litematica mod, then place the LITEMATIC file in the "schematics" folder in the ".minecraft" folder. Then, click the Load Schematics option in the Litematica screen in Minecraft to load the schematic saved in the LITEMATIC file.
